247.description: Configure 24/7 mode to keep the bot connected to voice channels

errors.not_in_voice:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Join a voice channel first!** You need to be connected to a voice channel to manage 24/7 mode.

ğŸ’¡ *This ensures I know which channel to stay connected to.*
errors.generic:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Oops! Something went wrong** while configuring 24/7 mode.

ğŸ’¡ *Please try again in a moment, or contact support if the issue persists.*

messages.disabled:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **24/7 Mode Disabled** - I'll leave voice channels when inactive.

ğŸ’¡ *I'll disconnect after everyone leaves or when there's no music playing.*
messages.enabled:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **24/7 Mode Enabled** - I'll stay connected to voice channels 24/7!

ğŸµ *Perfect for servers that want continuous music availability.*

noprefix.description: Manage users who can use commands without needing a prefix
noprefix.invalid_action:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Invalid action!** 

**ğŸ“ Correct usage:** `{usage}`

ğŸ’¡ *Use `add`, `remove`, `list`, or `clear` as actions.*
noprefix.list_empty:
<:Aria1_info:1423191697294364762> **No special permissions set** - All users need to use the prefix for commands.

ğŸ’¡ *Use `noprefix add @user` to grant no-prefix permission to someone.*
noprefix.no_user_provided:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **User required!** Please mention a user or provide their user ID.

ğŸ’¡ *Example: `noprefix add @username` or `noprefix add 123456789`*
noprefix.invalid_user:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Invalid user!** I couldn't find that user.

ğŸ’¡ *Make sure the user ID is correct or the user is in this server.*
noprefix.user_already_added:
<:Aria1_info:1423191697294364762> **Already set!** **{user}** already has no-prefix permission.

ğŸ’¡ *They can already use commands without the prefix.*
noprefix.user_added:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Permission granted!** **{user}** (`{userId}`) can now use commands without prefix.

 *They can now use commands like `play` instead of `!play`*
noprefix.user_not_found:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **User not found!** **{user}** doesn't have no-prefix permission.

ğŸ’¡ *Use `noprefix list` to see who has these permissions.*
noprefix.user_removed:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Permission removed!** **{user}** (`{userId}`) no longer has no-prefix permission.

ğŸ’¡ *They'll need to use the prefix for commands now.*
noprefix.user_fetch_error:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Couldn't find user** with ID: `{userId}`

ğŸ’¡ *The user might not be in this server or the ID might be incorrect.*

fairplay.description: Enable fair music sharing - prevents users from dominating the queue

errors.not_in_voice:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Join a voice channel first!** You need to be connected to a voice channel to manage fairplay mode.

<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Oops! Something went wrong** while configuring fairplay mode.

ğŸ’¡ *Please try again in a moment, or contact support if the issue persists.*

messages.disabled:

messages.enabled:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Fairplay Mode Enabled** - Everyone gets equal queue time!

invite.description: Get the bot invite link to add Aria to your server
invite.content:
<:Aria1_link:1423215291386826793> **Add me to your server!** Click the invite button below to bring high-quality music to your community.

ğŸ› ï¸ **Need help?** Join our support server for assistance, updates, and community chat!

ğŸ’¡ *I come with premium music features and 24/7 uptime.*

help.description: Display the complete command guide and usage instructions

options.command: The specific command you want detailed information about

help.content:
**Hey there! I'm {bot}** - your premium music companion!
<:Aria1_circle:1423270589589884938> **Quick Start:** Use `{prefix}play <song name | URL>` to start jamming!
<:Aria1_circle:1423270589589884938> **Detailed Help:** Use `{prefix}help <command>` for specific command info.

**<a:ht_Arrowyw:1127980090391806034> Available Commands**
help.title: <:Aria1_info:1423191697294364762> Command Help Center
help.not_found:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Command not found!** The `{cmdName}` command doesn't exist.

ğŸ’¡ *Use `help` without arguments to see all available commands.*

about.description: Learn about Aria's creator, features, and development journey

fields.creator: <:Aria1_dev:1423191690574827650> Creator
fields.description:
ğŸš€ **Passionate developer** specializing in Node.js, Discord.js, and cutting-edge web technologies.

ğŸµ **Mission:** Created Aria to deliver premium, high-quality music experiences to Discord communities worldwide.

ğŸ’« **Vision:** Making music accessible, reliable, and enjoyable for everyone!

dj.description: Configure DJ permissions and roles for advanced music control

errors.provide_role:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Role required!** Please mention or provide a role to manage.

ğŸ’¡ *Example: `dj add @DJ Role` or use the role picker.*
errors.no_roles:
<:Aria1_info:1423191697294364762> **No DJ roles configured** - Anyone can control music right now.

ğŸ’¡ *Use `dj add @role` to set up DJ permissions.*
errors.invalid_subcommand:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Invalid command!** Please use a valid DJ subcommand.

ğŸ“‹ **Available:** `add`, `remove`, `clear`, `toggle`, `list`

messages.role_exists:
<:Aria1_info:1423191697294364762> **Already configured!** The DJ role <@&{roleId}> is already set up.

ğŸ’¡ *This role already has DJ permissions.*
messages.role_added:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **DJ role added!** <@&{roleId}> now has DJ permissions.

ğŸ§ *Members with this role can control music playback.*
messages.role_not_found:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Role not configured!** <@&{roleId}> is not set as a DJ role.

ğŸ’¡ *Use `dj list` to see current DJ roles.*
messages.role_removed:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **DJ role removed!** <@&{roleId}> no longer has DJ permissions.

ğŸ’¡ *Members with this role can no longer control music.*
messages.all_roles_cleared:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **All DJ roles cleared!** Music control is now open to everyone.

ğŸµ *Anyone can manage the music queue and playback.*
messages.toggle:
<:Aria1_settings:1423191713262076034> **DJ mode status:** {status}

ğŸ’¡ *When enabled, only users with DJ roles can control music.*

options.add: Add a role that can control music playback
options.remove: Remove DJ permissions from a role
options.clear: Remove all DJ roles and disable restrictions
options.role: The role to grant or remove DJ permissions

prefix.description: View or customize the command prefix for your server

errors.prefix_too_long:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Prefix too long!** Please choose a prefix with 3 characters or less.

ğŸ’¡ *Short prefixes like `!`, `?`, or `.` work best for quick typing.*

messages.current_prefix:

ğŸ’¡ *Use `{prefix}prefix set <new>` to change it, or `{prefix}prefix reset` to restore default.*
messages.prefix_set:

ğŸ‰ *Try it out: `{prefix}play your favorite song`*
messages.prefix_reset:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Prefix reset!** Back to the default prefix `{prefix}`

ğŸ’¡ *All commands now use the standard prefix.*

options.set: Change the command prefix to something custom

errors.channel_exists: The song request channel already exists.

bassboost.description: Enhance low-frequency sounds with customizable bass amplification

options.level: Bass intensity level: high, medium, low, or off

messages.high:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **High Bass Boost!** ğŸ”Š Maximum low-end punch activated.

ğŸµ *Perfect for hip-hop, electronic, and bass-heavy tracks.*
messages.low:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Low Bass Boost** ğŸ¶ Subtle bass enhancement applied.

ğŸµ *Adds gentle warmth without overwhelming the mix.*
messages.medium:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Medium Bass Boost** ğŸµ Balanced bass amplification active.

ğŸµ *Great for most music genres and general listening.*
messages.off:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Bass Boost Disabled** - Natural sound restored.

ğŸ¶ *Audio is back to its original bass levels.*
messages.invalid_level:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Invalid bass level!** Please choose from available options.

ğŸ›ï¸ **Available levels:** `high`, `medium`, `low`, `off`

ğŸ’¡ *Try: `bassboost medium` for balanced enhancement.*

messages.filter_disabled:

lowpass.description: Apply low-pass filtering to create muffled, underwater-like effects

<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Low-Pass Filter On!** ğŸŒŠ Smooth, mellow sound applied.

nightcore.description: Speed up and pitch shift music for high-energy nightcore style

messages.filter_enabled:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Nightcore Mode!** âš¡ High-energy, fast-paced vibes activated!

ğŸ€ *Faster tempo with higher pitch - perfect for dance and anime music.*
messages.filter_disabled:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Nightcore Disabled** - Original tempo and pitch restored.

pitch.description: Adjust the musical pitch without changing playback speed

options.pitch: Pitch multiplier value (0.5 = lower pitch, 2.0 = higher pitch)

errors.invalid_number:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Invalid pitch value!** Please use a number between 0.5 and 5.0.

ğŸµ **Examples:** `1.0` = normal, `0.8` = lower, `1.2` = higher

ğŸ’¡ *Lower values make voices deeper, higher values make them more chipmunk-like.*

messages.pitch_set:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Pitch Adjusted!** ğŸ¼ New pitch level: **{pitch}x**

ğŸ¶ *The music now sounds {pitchDescription}.*

rate.description: Change both speed and pitch together for time-stretching effects

options.rate: Playback rate multiplier (0.5 = half speed, 2.0 = double speed)

errors.invalid_number:
<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Invalid rate value!** Please use a number between 0.5 and 5.0.

âš¡ **Examples:** `1.0` = normal, `0.75` = slower, `1.25` = faster

ğŸ’¡ *This changes both speed and pitch together, like a turntable.*

messages.rate_set:
<:Aria1_correct:1423345175052419084> **Playback Rate Changed!** âš¡ New rate: **{rate}x**

ğŸµ *Music is now playing at {rateDescription} the original speed.*

messages.enabled:

speed.description: Adjust playback speed while preserving original pitch

<:Aria1_wrong:1423345178600804434> **Invalid speed value!** Please use a number between 0.5 and 5.0.
